description: A 6-shot nature documentary style storyboard. Includes longer shots (5s, 8s) to demonstrate video chaining.

shots.description: Opening: First light hitting mountain peaks
shots.prompt: majestic snow-capped mountain peaks at dawn, first rays of sunlight, alpenglow effect, dramatic clouds below summit, aerial perspective, national geographic style
shots.negative_prompt: blurry, low quality, distorted, text, watermark

shots.description: Forest stream with morning mist - LONG SHOT
shots.prompt: crystal clear mountain stream flowing through ancient forest, morning mist rising, moss-covered rocks, sunbeams filtering through canopy, peaceful nature scene
shots.negative_prompt: blurry, low quality, distorted, text, watermark

shots.prompt: elegant deer grazing in wildflower meadow, soft morning light, mountains in background, wildlife photography style, shallow depth of field

shots.prompt: majestic bald eagle soaring high above mountain valley, wings spread wide, dramatic clouds, aerial perspective, wildlife documentary, sharp detail
